name: Infinite Phil (Hartman/Donahue)
description:
Created in 2004 as 12-second video loop. Translated to a GIF in 2021. 

Created for The Infinite Fill Group Show at Foxy Production curated by Cory and Jamie Arcangel. 


We've minted 10,000 of the GIFs with the hope that Infinite Phil will fill everyone's collection. When all 10,000 are collected the copyright reverts to the public domain.

"Phil Hartman playing the talk-show host Phil Donahue, endlessly shaking his head in a [12]-second loop from some long-ago 'Saturday Night Live' [...]"
